name: Custom T-Shirt Quilt
description:
You provide your t-shirt collection and we will turn it into a cozy quilt!

T-shirts are reinforced with a fusible fabric to prevent stretching and will make your shirts look like new, even if they have become thin or have holes.

Quilts are backed filled with a high quality poly/cotton blend batting and backed with a cozy and warm black flannel (other colors available upon request).

We will work closely with you to make sure your quilt is exactly as you imagine. A variety of styles and additional options are available.

Please allow 3 to 4 weeks production time.



Email britta.folden@gmail.com with any questions. Once you place your order, we will send you instructions on where to send your t-shirts and what to expect in the process.
